DOC.brief_summary: This study examine tecemotide ( L-BLP25 ) combination standard treatment prostate cancer .
DOC.criteria: Histopathologic documentation prostate cancer confirm institution study enrollment prior start study Newly diagnose previously untreated prostate cancer intermediate high risk feature define protocol No evidence metastatic disease compute tomography ( CT ) / magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) bone scan No systemic steroid use within 2 week prior initiation experimental therapy .
